00020 #ifndef H_WRITE
00021 #define H_WRITE
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 #include "utils.h"
00026 #include "exceptions.h"
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization {
00029  
00030     class Writer;
00031     
00032     class Writable {
00033         public:
00044         virtual void write(Writer*) const throw(WritingException)  = 0 ;
00045         virtual ~Writable() {}
00046     };
00047     
00048     class Writer {
00049         public:
00050         
00052             virtual std::string serialize(bool withClassName, const Writable*w) = 0;
00053             virtual ~Writer() { }
00054         public:
00055         
00056         virtual void startWriting(cstr className, unsigned char version = 1) throw (WritingException) = 0;
00058             virtual void write_u8 (  uint8_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00059             virtual void write_i8 (   int8_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00060             virtual void write_i16(  int16_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00061             virtual void write_i32(  int32_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00062             virtual void write_f32(float32_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00063             virtual void write_f64(float64_t, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00064             
00065             virtual void write_u8   (const   uint8_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00066             virtual void write_i8   (const    int8_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00067             virtual void write_i16  (const   int16_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00068             virtual void write_i32  (const   int32_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00069             virtual void write_f32  (const float32_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00070             virtual void write_f64  (const float64_t*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00071 
00073             virtual void writeBytes (const      void*, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00074 
00076             virtual void writeString(cstr s, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) =0;
00077             
00079             virtual void writeObject(bool needClassName, const Writable*w, cstr name="")
00080                 throw(WritingException) = 0;
00081                 
00082         virtual void doneWriting() throw(WritingException) = 0;
00083     };
00084     
00085 }} // namespace RDK2::Serialization
00086 
00087 
00088 namespace RDK2 {
00089     using Serialization::Writer;
00090     using Serialization::WritingException;  
00091 }
00092 
00093 #endif
